game.name: Uurnog Uurnlimited
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Uurnog Uurnlimited의 익살스럽고 엉뚱한 세계로 들어가보세요! 큐브, 폭탄, 이상한 사람들과 사랑스러운 동물로 가득한 우스운, 퍼즐로 가득한 땅을 탐험하고 나서 모두 훔쳐보세요! 싱글 플레이어 또는 협력하여 플레이하고 점프하며, 다채로운 컬렉션을 잡아서 던지고 다시 저장소(Save Room)로 순간 이동하세요(이것을 파괴하려고 하지 마세요).
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enter the wacky & whimsical world of Uurnog Uurnlimited! Explore a silly, puzzle-filled land full of cubes, bombs, weird people & adorable animals — then steal them all! Play single player or co-op as you jump, grab, throw & teleport your colorful collection back to the Save Room.

reviewHighlights.text: The further in I played, the more I lose interest because of the game feeling like there's no objective or progression towards anything. The level des...
i dont like it, it looked nice in the trailer, but for some reason it doesnt catch me.
